channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
I made a new shop and when i added it to the npc when i went to get that shop to open my mypar just locks and crashes what am i dong wrong ??
shop = 26 Varrock_Cook_Training 2 2 371 100 7844 100 377 100 384 100 398 100 391 100 331 100 336 100 4288 100 21 100

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Darksoul706 Darksoul706
item.description:
@Darksoul706 wrote:

i cant even add shops so i cant help ya -.- all my shops are broken even the npc wont talk i’ve been working on my server for 2 days striaght and finally the shops dont work guess its nnot gonna have shops for mine :’( wish i could help ya[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 09:31:06 PM[/size][hr]if you dont got the new patch then take 7844 out if u do got the new patch leave it
